bookRemove.text: Once removed {{bookName}} can't be restored. This is forever! Are you sure you want to proceed?

medium.text: You are about to publish your article to Medium (in draft mode). New article will be created, even if you have already published this article before. Choose chapters and wikis that you want to publish.
medium.divider: Wikis will be published after main text
medium.published: It has been published to Medium. Click on the button below to open an article.

epub.text: You are about to generate EPUB. Choose chapters and wikis that you want to publish.
epub.divider: Wikis will be published after main text
epub.published: EPUB file was generated. Click on the button below to save it.

writex.header: Publish on Writex.io, share a link to the Reader

readers.paidSubscribersHint: Your subscribers who paid for this book

biases.text:
GPT-Neo was trained as an autoregressive language model. This means that its core functionality is taking a string of text and predicting the next token. While language models are widely used for tasks other than this, there are a lot of unknowns with this work.

GPT-Neo was trained on the Pile, a dataset known to contain profanity, lewd, and otherwise abrasive language. Depending on your usecase GPT-Neo may produce socially unacceptable text. See Sections 5 and 6 of the Pile paper for a more detailed analysis of the biases in the Pile.

As with all language models, it is hard to predict in advance how GPT-Neo will respond to particular prompts and offensive content may occur without warning. We recommend having a human curate or filter the outputs before releasing them, both to censor undesirable content and to improve the quality of the results.

list.empty: No chapters were created yet. Chapters are backbone of any story.
list.clickToRemove: click again to remove the chapter

list.empty: No text versions were created yet. Create a new text version, for example "Draft" or "Final".

item.empty: Start typing your chapter text here...

name.empty: Enter all possible wiki's names and entries in the text through comma...

categories.empty: Enter categories names, to which this wiki belongs...

fuzziness.4: You don't know what you're doing

list.empty: No wikis here yet. Start describing the world around your story. Create characters, cities, planets.
list.categoriesInfo: all wikis, click on wiki to expand

tree.info: all categories and created wikis are displayed here

item.empty: Wiki will appear here when you will click on marked wiki in the text.

widgets.notAttached: Press the button and choose any widget you want to see here.
widgets.choosePreset: Choose layout preset from the list

chapters.name: Chapters list
chapters.description: If you need a list of chapters in front of your eyes all the time, you can use this widget.

versions.name: Versions list
versions.description: If you need a list of versions in front of your eyes all the time (with adding, editing and removing), you can use this widget.

textBlocks.name: Text
textBlocks.description: A text widget is a simple text editor. It shows the text of your book or article.

comments.name: Comments
comments.description: Comments to the text. List of all comments to the text.

spellchecks.name: Spellcheck
spellchecks.description: List of all found issues in your text.

wikis.name: Wikis
wikis.description: List of all wikis in your text.

wiki.name: Wiki
wiki.description: Wiki widget shows the description of the selected wiki.

version.empty: No text versions were created yet. You need to have at least one to start writing. Click button below to create one.
version.notChosen: Here you should see one of the text versions. But active version was not chosen. Please choose a text version to display here.

list.description: List of all found issues in your text.

item.empty: Enter words through comma, that will be ignored by spellchecker...

share.notAuthor: You can't share if you are not an author.

list.error: Sorry, couldn't load access rights. Please try again later
list.empty: Only you has an access. Add people using selector at the top.

userAutocomplete.noResults: Please enter full email. For a fraud protection search on partial email will not be performed.

share.accessChangedToRestricted: Your access was restricted. Document reload will be done in a second.
share.accessChangedToGranted: Access to some additional parts of the book was granted.

publish.internalHelper: Publish on Writex.io and share the Reader link.
publish.otherHelper: Publish on other platforms or save your work.

toolbar.inputPlaceholder: What do you want to know?
toolbar.helpText: It's a beta version of AI. There are limitations and biases in the data. Please read more here.
toolbar.longLoading: Takes longer than usual. Please wait or try later.
toolbar.error: 🤖 Sorry, couldn't get an answer. Please try again later.
